recipe.ingredients: - rolled oats: 1 cup - water: 2 cups - diced apple: 1 medium - ground cinnamon: 1 teaspoon - chia seeds: 1 tablespoon - unsweetened almond milk: 1/2 cup - vanilla extract: 1 teaspoon - zero-calorie sweetener (such as stevia): 1 tablespoon
recipe.directions: 1. Cook Oats: In a saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add the rolled oats and simmer on low heat for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally until the oats are soft. 2. Add Flavors: Stir in the diced apple, cinnamon, and chia seeds. Continue to cook for another 3 minutes. 3. Finish with Liquids: Remove from heat and stir in the unsweetened almond milk and vanilla extract. Sweeten with stevia to taste. 4. Serve: Divide the oatmeal into bowls and serve warm.
